The harvest is at hand, vvherin the tares shall be bound, and cast into the fyre and brent. [...] Champneys, John, fl. 1548.
[104] p.
By Humfrey Powell, dwellyng aboue Holvurne Conduit. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum, [Imprinted at London : An. Do. 1548]
By John Champneys---cf. STC. Imprint from colophon. Caption title. Aii missigned Bii. Signatures: A-F G⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
